title: Resolve Task Dependency Conflict
description: The project schedule shows that 'painting' is scheduled to start before 'drywall finishing' is complete. This logical conflict must be resolved.

tasks.description: Scan the project schedule for logical dependency errors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a finish-to-start dependency violation between 'drywall finishing' and 'painting'.

tasks.description: Adjust the start date of the 'painting' task to be the day after the 'drywall finishing' task is scheduled to complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: The schedule is corrected to reflect the proper task sequence.
